unnormalised: Arrey yaar, aanik ek Somvarachi sokall, aanik ek bug code-ant! Mhaje team lead, Mr. Sharma, tankam 5 PM-meren sarkhem zai, nam tor! Debugging itlench kothin na, coffee machine-an konk out korpak tharailam. Hanv shapath gheta, Java-nt coding korop he aatantlem sarllem. Ani client-ak sangpak provas korpak soddunk naka kiteak website-an ‘404: samosas mellunk na’ dakounk tharailam. Gambhirpanen chai-fueled development-ak bodolpak vichar korun asa; kiteak tem vostu sarkhi kortolem.
normalised: Arrey yaar, ani ek Somvarichi sokall, code-ant ani ek bug! Mhaje team lead, Mister Sharma, tankam paanch vaaje porian sarkhem zai, nam tor! Debug korop kitench kotthin nhoi mhonn, coffee machine-anuch kaam korop sodlem. Hanv soput gheun sangta, hea poros Java-nt coding korop sopeponnachem. Ani client-ak kitem sangunk sodta titleaveli tanchim utram, website-an kiteak 'four hundred and four: samosas mellonant' dakhoitai mhunn te kitem sangtele tem hanv sangtale. Chai-ntlean development suru korchem poddeit mhunn mhaka dista; kiteak mhunnlear te astolem sarkhem kortelem.
text: Arrey yaar, aanik ek Somvarachi sokall, aanik ek bug code-ant! Mhaje team lead, Mr. Sharma, tankam 5 PM-meren sarkhem zai, nam tor! Debugging itlench kothin na, coffee machine-an konk out korpak tharailam. Hanv shapath gheta, Java-nt coding korop he aatantlem sarllem. Ani client-ak sangpak provas korpak soddunk naka kiteak website-an ‘404: samosas mellunk na’ dakounk tharailam. Gambhirpanen chai-fueled development-ak bodolpak vichar korun asa; kiteak tem vostu sarkhi kortolem.
